Well not in my knowledge, Doctor: ?
original_dialogue.doctor: In that case, you have Esophagitis.

gpt3_output.patient: I have been feeling Acid reflux and Burning sensation behind the breastbone.
gpt3_output.doctor: acid reflux and burning sensation behind the breastbone are both symptoms of gastroesophageal reflux disease (GERD). GERD is a condition in which stomach acid or other stomach contents flow back up into the esophagus, the tube that carries food from the mouth to the stomach. issue: GPT3 abruptly gives a diagnosis without asking proper questions to the patient. But this time it also suggests other symptoms for the disease that it had diagnosed.
